programme.title: Hercules and the Captive Women
programme.desc: The mythical Greek hero (Reg Park) rescues a maiden left at the mercy of a beast and goes on to save his son from the sexist queen of lost Atlantis (Fay Spain).

programme.title: Quantum Cowboys
programme.desc: Hapless drifters Frank and Bruno team up with a woman to recover her land and trek across 1870s southern Arizona to find an elusive frontier musician.

programme.title: Hercules and the Captive Women
programme.desc: The mythical Greek hero (Reg Park) rescues a maiden left at the mercy of a beast and goes on to save his son from the sexist queen of lost Atlantis (Fay Spain).

programme.title: Quantum Cowboys
programme.desc: Hapless drifters Frank and Bruno team up with a woman to recover her land and trek across 1870s southern Arizona to find an elusive frontier musician.

programme.title: The Dark Valley
programme.desc: In 19th-century Austria, war erupts between a traveler (Sam Riley) and a local family after one of their members dies under mysterious circumstances.

programme.title: The Grand Duel
programme.desc: A mysterious gunfighter (Lee Van Cleef) protects a man accused of killing an Arizona big shot.

programme.title: The Fate of Lee Khan
programme.desc: Women (Li Hua Li, Helen Ma, Mao Ying) fight Mongols in 13th-century China.

programme.title: Awaken Punch
programme.desc: A young man uses a special maneuver to battle gangsters terrorizing his village.

programme.title: Hit-and-Run Squad
programme.desc: A hit-and-run police task force chases an out-of-control businessman committing crimes with his madness for speed and cars.

programme.title: Fist and Faith
programme.desc: In the 1930s, a teacher and his students create a study club to preserve their culture and language.

programme.title: Kung Fu Traveler
programme.desc: A Chinese general is accidentally sent back in time after aliens take over the world.

programme.title: Kung Fu Traveler 2
programme.desc: Gen. Chen goes back in time to the late Qing Dynasty to find the master of the northern style of kung fu.

programme.title: Brothers Till We Die
programme.desc: When a robbery goes sideways, two crooks set out to teach their backstabbers a lesson.
